```{=html}
<style>
.references .csl-entry {
  margin-bottom: 1em; 
}
.hanging-indent div.csl-entry {
  margin-left: 0em !important;    /* Remove the extra left margin */
  text-indent: -1.5em !important; /* Keep hanging indent but less aggressive */
}
</style>
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Wait for bibliography to render, then replace URLs with [pdf]
  setTimeout(function() {
    const bibLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.references .csl-entry a');
    bibLinks.forEach(function(link) {
      // Replace the link text with [pdf]
      link.textContent = '[pdf]';
      link.style.textDecoration = 'none'; // Optional: remove underline
      link.style.color = '#007bff'; // Optional: make it blue like a link
      link.title = 'Download PDF: ' + link.href; // Add tooltip with original URL
    });
  }, 1000); // Wait 1 second for bibliography to fully render
});
</script>
```

We provide a bibliography of research articles and reports that use individual-level immigration enforcement data. If you have a publication to suggest for inclusion, please [email us](mailto:deportation_data_questions@law.berkeley.edu).
